thread.title_full: Gossip | Scott Disick admits himself to rehab for drug and alcohol addiction - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Scott Disick admits himself to rehab for drug and alcohol addiction
text:
It's been reported that the 32-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashians star, and father of three, has been "has been staying at a drug rehabilitation centre in Malibu."
This news broke just as it was reported that Kourtney Kardashian's ex husband, NBA star Lamar Odom was hospitalised after an overdose at a Las Vegas brothel. According to reports this morning, the 35-year-old "suffered several strokes overnight and a 'significant amount of cocaine' was found in his system."
Scott Disick is currently seeking treatment at a rehab center: http://t.co/W8SvBKFpDG pic.twitter.com/z3qr772Otv
â€” Us Weekly (@usweekly) October 15, 2015 Us Weekly reports that: "Disick - who split with Kourtney over the summer - briefly checked into a Costa Rica rehab for hallucinogenic treatment this past March, and checked into a Florida facility in July... As Disick remains in rehab, Kourtney has been looking after their three children - Mason, 5, Penelope, 3, and Reign, 8 months. On Wednesday, she was spotted taking Penelope and her niece North West to a ballet class."
Wishing a speedy recovery to all.
